name: Ascent of Kings
synopsis: The death of a King. An epic challenge to choose a new ruler. Will the smallest of four brothers turn out to be the strongest? Will a young boy become King? The answer is up to you. • Classic adventure-platformer gameplay. • Explore and encounter strange creatures - some harmless, some not. • Navigate dangerous passages and evade deadly traps. • Seek out elemental shrines and receive upgraded abilities.
